metadata.title: USN-6841-2 -- PHP vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6841-1 fixed a vulnerability in PHP. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that PHP could early return in the filter_var function  resulting in invalid user information being treated as valid user  information. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose raw  user input information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6841-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-bcmath - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-bz2 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-cgi - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-cli - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-common - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-curl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-dba - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-dev - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-enchant - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-fpm - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-gd - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-gmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-imap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-interbase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-intl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-json - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-ldap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-mbstring - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-mcrypt - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-mysql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-odbc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-opcache - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-pgsql - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-phpdbg - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-pspell - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-readline - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-recode - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-snmp - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-soap - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-sqlite3 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-sybase - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-tidy - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-xml - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-xmlrpc - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-xsl - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 php7.0-zip - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm11 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
